Package arb19_kpa1.game.model.units

Class AMovableUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • arb19_kpa1.game.model.units.AGameUnit
      • arb19_kpa1.game.model.units.APlayerOwnedUnit
        • arb19_kpa1.game.model.units.AMovableUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Miner, SiegeUnit, Soldier
    public abstract class AMovableUnit
extends APlayerOwnedUnit
    A movable unit in the game, which can be produced in a city, and can attack things.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
